list.abs: ...现这三角形的轮廓并不完整，换言之，这个三角形并不存在，而是我们感觉到它存在，所以知觉心理学家称它为「错觉轮廓」（illusory contour）。诸如此类的人类视觉错觉现象，实在不胜枚举。它们究竟是怎么发生的？一直是心理学家感兴趣的问题，本文就.
ill posed problem 不适定问题illusory correlation 产生错觉相关image 象集
...个样子（67），这意指行者在圆满次第时能够生起微细幻身（ illusory body）开展他的知觉直到包括一切相，视它们为净光根本心的 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from ecclesiastical Latin illusorius, from Latin illus- 'mocked', from the verb illudere

entry.tran: 幻觉的;虚假的;不切实际的
entry.def: If you describe something as illusory, you mean that although it seems true or possible, it is in fact false or impossible.

means.word_mean: 1. based on or having the nature of an illusion;

sentences.sentence: "illusive hopes of of finding a better job"
"Secret activities offer presidents the alluring but often illusory promise that they can achieve foreign policy goals without the bothersome debate and open decision that are staples of democracy"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"使……,成为,进入,再"; 2. 放在同辅音词根前表示"不,无"

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不,无+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
il不,无+liberal宽大的→adj.气量狭窄的,吝啬的
il不,无+licit合法的, 正当的→adj.违法的,违禁的
il不,无+literate有文化的→adj.不识字的
il不,无+logical逻辑的→adj.不合逻辑的
il使……,成为,进入,再+lus玩弄+ion表名词→被[幻觉]玩弄→幻觉
il使……,成为,进入,再+lumin光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明
il使……,成为,进入,再+lustr=lust光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明

sentences.en: It seemed to an idealistic and illusory dream.
sentences.cn: 那似乎是个不切实际、理想主义的美梦。
